definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The samples of tungsten carbide were prepared from the blue tungsten trioxide and the ammonium paratungstate Separately.
sentences.chinese: 用藍色氧化鎢和仲鎢酸銨分別製取碳化鎢。

sentences.english: With the original process, the qualification rate of the liquation carbonide was only 75.
sentences.chinese: 原工藝下液析碳化物合格率僅爲75。

sentences.english: SiC is a good substrate material for laser mirrors with higher therma…
sentences.chinese: 碳化硅是較優秀的反射鏡材料。

sentences.english: The experimental studies on iron carbide formation by two step method have been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 在實驗室條件下進行了二步法制備碳化鐵的研究。

sentences.english: Tungsten carbide mechanical seal is oil lubricated for long life.
sentences.chinese: 碳化鎢機械密封採用油進行潤滑，使用壽命長。

sentences.english: The development and research status of boron carbides for the Bulletproof Ceramic were summarized in this article.
sentences.chinese: 本文綜述了碳化硼抗彈陶瓷材料的發展和研究現狀。

sentences.english: In addition its excellent conductivity avoids the introduction of temperature gradients.
sentences.chinese: 而碳化硅卓越的導熱性則避免了引入溫度梯度。

sentences.english: Concrete carbonization is one of the main reasons affecting structure durability of the concrete.
sentences.chinese: 混凝土碳化是影響混凝土結構耐久性的重要因素之一。

sentences.english: Now instead of coniferous forests there are just carbonized remains of trees and voids.
sentences.chinese: 現在沒有了針葉林，只有碳化的樹木和空洞依然存在。

sentences.english: A new method was applied to the test of corrosion resistance of SiC-Si3N4 material.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氮化硅結合碳化硅材料耐腐蝕性能的測試方法。

sentences.english: The amount of NbC depends on the adding amount of Nb.
sentences.chinese: 碳化鈮的數量與鈮的加入量有關。
這些燈泡使用的是碳化紙板。

sentences.english: A trademark used for an abrasive of silicon carbide crystals.
sentences.chinese: 金剛砂一種碳化硅晶體磨料的商標名。

sentences.english: Carbonization activation kinetics of sisal based activated carbon fibers was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了劍麻纖維碳化活化反應動力學。

sentences.english: The three mirrors are directly mounted on the Silicon Carbide plates using titanium bolts.
sentences.chinese: 三塊反射鏡使用鈦制螺栓直接安裝在碳化硅的端板上。

sentences.english: The fabrication process and application of silicon carbide mirror are presented.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了碳化硅反射鏡材料常用製備方法的特點。

definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
